unnormalised: Breaking News: A heartwarming tale from Lucknow!
normalised: Breaking News: A heartwarming tale from Lucknow!

unnormalised: The internet's buzzing after Mr. Rajeev Sharma, a retired school teacher, was surprised with a grand felicitation by his former students on 10/10/2024. The students, now successful professionals ranging from engineers to doctors, fondly remembered Mr. Sharma's dedication. "He was more than just a teacher; he was a guide," shared Ms. Aisha Khan, a leading software engineer. She recalled how Mr. Sharma always addressed everyone with respect – even kids!
normalised: The internet's buzzing after Mister Rajeev Sharma, a retired school teacher, was surprised with a grand felicitation by his former students on tenth october two thousand and twenty four. The students, now successful professionals ranging from engineers to doctors, fondly remembered Mister Sharma's dedication. "He was more than just a teacher; he was a guide," shared Miss Aisha Khan, a leading software engineer. She recalled how Mister Sharma always addressed everyone with respect – even kids!

unnormalised: The event, held at the Lucknow Civic Centre, saw attendance from various dignitaries, including local politicians and education officials. Many spoke highly of Mr. Sharma's contribution to shaping the future generation. A donation of Rs. 50,000 was also collected by the students to aid Mr. Sharma's post-retirement life. He accepted the honour with grace, stating he was just doing his duty.
normalised: The event, held at the Lucknow Civic Centre, saw attendance from various dignitaries, including local politicians and education officials. Many spoke highly of Mister Sharma's contribution to shaping the future generation. A donation of rupee fifty thousand was also collected by the students to aid Mister Sharma's post-retirement life. He accepted the honour with grace, stating he was just doing his duty.

unnormalised: News spread like wildfire and #RespectForTeachers and #LucknowLegend are trending on X. Many are lauding Mr. Sharma for embodying the true spirit of a teacher, someone who nurtures and guides without expecting anything in return. Some current students joked that they hope someday someone cares enough to give them ₹500 after retirement.
normalised: News spread like wildfire and hash Respect For Teachers and hash Lucknow Legend are trending on X. Many are lauding Mister Sharma for embodying the true spirit of a teacher, someone who nurtures and guides without expecting anything in return. Some current students joked that they hope someday someone cares enough to give them rupee five hundred after retirement.

unnormalised: Mr. Sharma’s story serves as a reminder of the profound impact teachers have on our lives. It's a real inspo! From all of us, a big salute to Mr. Rajeev Sharma! Well deserved sir!
normalised: Mister Sharma’s story serves as a reminder of the profound impact teachers have on our lives. It's a real inspo! From all of us, a big salute to Mister Rajeev Sharma! Well deserved sir!
